projects.name: Individual Web Site V2
description: Developed a personal website using JavaScript and React, focusing on frontend functionality and interactive user interfaces.
Deployed the site on GitHub Pages with a custom domain, handling DNS configuration and HTTPS setup.
Utilized JSON for client-side data storage and management to simulate database interactions within the website.

projects.name: Initiate News, Capstone Project
description: Developed server utilizing ASP.NET Core WebAPI, with SQL Server as the database with NUnit.
Implemented server-side application using dependency injection to handle ChatGPT and NewsAPI service.
Entity Framework and REST API with JSON for data management and communication.

projects.name: Game Sales Website, College Team Project
description: Implemented a game sales website using ASP.NET Core MVC, ensuring a robust and user-friendly online platform.
Spearheaded the program architecture and model design, laying a solid foundation for scalable and efficient functionality.
Authored and executed comprehensive unit tests using Selenium, enhancing code reliability and performance.

projects.name: Lot Tracking System, Peer Group Orientation Project
description: Designed a server-client architecture using C# and SQL Server.
Developed UI using WPF and MVVM, connected to the server via REST API.
Created a WEB API server on ASP.NET, integrating with SQL Server via Entity Framework.

projects.name: Individual Web Site
description: Developed individual websites using Blazor Frameworks and ASP.NET Core.
Deployed client pages and connected databases using RESTful APIs.

projects.name: Patent Application (No.10893478), Samsung Electronics
description: Patent Application (No.10893478): Multi-SIM devices scheduling for base station searcher.

projects.name: Galaxy S, Note and Watch, Samsung Electronics
description: Contributions to Galaxy S, Note, and Watch series at Samsung Electronics, focusing on dual sim standby architecture and power optimization during IDLE mode.
